content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Of course, you’ll receive a glamorous trophy and certificate for your office reception and those all important bragging rights, but winning an award gives you so much more. 

Winning an Influencer Marketing Award witnessed by senior representatives from the industry’s leading stakeholders is the pinnacle of 12 months of hard work. Add to that the value of winning an award which will speak for itself when differentiating your brand for current and prospective clients.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.4.8″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.8″]

Focus, Motivation & Teamwork

Often we receive feedback that gearing up to win an award provides focus, motivation and an end goal for the team. Something to work towards and strive for during the year. It brings together and motivates the team and encourages creative, innovative thinking with clients and partners.

The mere act of entering will go some way to letting your employees know you value their hard work and if you do manage to make the shortlist, or bag an award on the night then employee motivation will reach unprecedented levels! 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.4.8″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.8″]

Building & Cementing Client Relationships

Collaborating with clients on an award entry solidifies the relationship and brings teams closer together. It also provides an opportunity to benchmark your work against your peers and celebrate with clients during the evening. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.4.8″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.8″]

A USP in a Crowded Market

An award seal on your website or RFP documentation will speak volumes and we’ve found that word of mouth on a gong is an incredibly powerful tool when getting to shortlist stage for new business, especially in an industry where differentiation is a challenge.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.8″][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.4.8″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.8″]

Industry Development

You’ll be helping the industry develop and mature by showcasing exceptional work proving the value of influencer marketing to the wider business, brands and marketing teams.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Add to that the […]
